titles.title: HEAL Act of 2023
Halting the Epidemic of Addiction and Loss Act of 2023
HEAL Act of 2023
A bill to ensure references to opioid overdose reversal agents in certain grant programs of the Department of Health and Human Services are not limited to naloxone.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
